info.title: EPL Defense API
info.description: English Premier League statistics and data API

get.description: Get leagues with optional filtering by country or search term.
Get teams with optional filtering by league, season, country, or search term.
Get detailed information about a specific team.
Get team statistics for a specific season and league.
Get all seasons available for a specific team.
Get countries where a team has played.
Get leagues where a team has played, optionally filtered by season.
Get fixtures for a specific team with various filtering options.
Get players for a specific team in a season.
Search for teams by name with optional country filtering.
Get league standings for a specific season and league.
Get fixtures with comprehensive filtering options.

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Fixture status (TBD, NS, 1H, HT, 2H, FT, AET, PEN, BT, SUSP, INT, PST, CANC, ABD, AWD, WO)
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Fixture status (TBD, NS, 1H, HT, 2H, FT, AET, PEN, BT, SUSP, INT, PST, CANC, ABD, AWD, WO)

get.description: Get player statistics for a specific fixture.

schema.title: Response Get Fixture Players Fixtures  Fixture Id  Players Get

get.description:
Get stored fixture player statistics from the local database.

This endpoint returns player statistics that have been ingested and stored locally,
providing faster access to historical data without hitting the external API.

schema.title: Response Get Stored Fixture Player Stats Fixtures  Fixture Id  Players Stored Get

get.description: Get all currently live fixtures.

parameters.name: league

schema.description: League ID to filter live fixtures
schema.title: League

parameters.description: League ID to filter live fixtures

200.description: Successful response with live fixtures data

get.description: Get head-to-head fixtures between two teams.

schema.title: Response Get Head To Head Fixtures Head To Head Get

get.description: Get all rounds for a league/season.

schema.title: Response Get Fixture Rounds Fixtures Rounds Get

get.description: Get all fixtures for a specific date.

schema.title: Response Get Fixtures By Date Fixtures Date  Date  Get

get.description: Get all fixtures for a specific round in a league/season.

schema.title: Response Get Round Fixtures Fixtures League  League Id  Season  Season Id  Round  Round  Get

get.description: Get team form based on recent fixtures.

parameters.name: last

schema.description: Number of recent fixtures to analyze
schema.title: Last

parameters.description: Number of recent fixtures to analyze

schema.title: Response Get Team Form Fixtures Team  Team Id  Form Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific fixture.

schema.title: Response Get Fixture Fixtures  Fixture Id  Get

get.description: Get all events for a specific fixture (goals, cards, substitutions, etc.).

schema.title: Response Get Fixture Events Fixtures  Fixture Id  Events Get

get.description: Get lineups for both teams in a specific fixture.

schema.title: Response Get Fixture Lineups Fixtures  Fixture Id  Lineups Get

get.description: Get team statistics for a specific fixture.

schema.title: Response Get Fixture Statistics Fixtures  Fixture Id  Statistics Get
Response Defense Table Defense Table Get

get.description: Get comprehensive team overview including fixtures, goals, and form.

schema.title: Response Get Team Overview Team Stats  Team Id  Overview Get

get.description: Get detailed goal statistics for a team.

schema.title: Response Get Team Goals Team Stats  Team Id  Goals Get

get.description: Get team fixture statistics including wins, draws, losses, and form.

schema.title: Response Get Team Fixtures Stats Team Stats  Team Id  Fixtures Stats Get

get.description: Get team card statistics (yellow and red cards).

schema.title: Response Get Team Cards Team Stats  Team Id  Cards Get

get.description: Get team lineup statistics and formations used.

schema.title: Response Get Team Lineups Team Stats  Team Id  Lineups Get

get.description: Get comprehensive team statistics comparison and summary.

schema.title: Response Compare Team Stats Team Stats  Team Id  Comparison Get

get.description: Get team statistics for all teams in a league/season or a specific team.

schema.title: Response Get League Team Stats Team Stats League  League Id  Season  Season Id  Get

get.description: Get all teams in a league/season without individual statistics (faster).

schema.title: Response Get League Teams Team Stats League  League Id  Season  Season Id  Teams Get

post.description: Trigger data ingestion for a specific league and season.

example.message: Data ingestion started for Premier League 2025

get.description: Get the current ingestion status for a league/season.

post.description: Quick endpoint to ingest EPL 2025 data.

example.message: Data ingestion started for Premier League 2025

get.description: Health check for ingestion service.

schema.title: Response Ingestion Health Ingestion Health Get

get.description:
Get comprehensive statistics for a specific player in a season.

This endpoint provides detailed season-long performance metrics for a player,
including goals, assists, cards, shots, passes, tackles, and other statistics.

schema.title: Response Get Player Statistics Player Stats Player  Player Id  Get

get.description:
Get player statistics for all players in a league/season.

This endpoint provides comprehensive player statistics across an entire league,
useful for creating league-wide player rankings and comparisons.

schema.title: Response Get League Player Statistics Player Stats League  League Id  Get

get.description:
Get player statistics for all players in a specific team.

This endpoint provides comprehensive player statistics for a team,
useful for team analysis and player performance comparison within the team.

schema.title: Response Get Team Player Statistics Player Stats Team  Team Id  Get

get.description:
Get all seasons for a specific player.

This endpoint shows all seasons a player has participated in,
useful for tracking player career progression and availability.

schema.title: Response Get Player Seasons Player Stats Player  Player Id  Seasons Get

get.description:
Get all available player countries.

This endpoint provides a list of all countries where players come from,
useful for filtering and analysis by nationality.

schema.title: Response Get Player Countries Player Stats Countries Get

get.description:
Search for players by name.

This endpoint allows searching for players by name with optional
filtering by league and season for more targeted results.

schema.title: Response Search Players Player Stats Search Get

get.description:
Get top goal scorers for a league/season.

This endpoint provides the top goal scorers in a league,
useful for creating goal-scoring leaderboards and analysis.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of top scorers to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of top scorers to return

schema.title: Response Get Top Scorers Player Stats Top Scorers Get

get.description:
Get top assist providers for a league/season.

This endpoint provides the top assist providers in a league,
useful for creating assist leaderboards and playmaker analysis.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of top assist providers to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of top assist providers to return

schema.title: Response Get Top Assists Player Stats Top Assists Get

get.description:
Get top defensive players for a league/season.

This endpoint provides the top defensive players based on various metrics,
useful for analyzing defensive performance and creating defensive leaderboards.

parameters.name: stat_type

schema.description: Defensive stat to rank by: tackles, interceptions, blocks, clean_sheets
schema.title: Stat Type

parameters.description: Defensive stat to rank by: tackles, interceptions, blocks, clean_sheets

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of top defensive players to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of top defensive players to return

schema.title: Response Get Defensive Leaders Player Stats Defensive Leaders Get

get.title: Get
get.description: API endpoint that was called

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: Any errors returned by the API
